rooms.description: Spacious living room with traditional Kerala furniture and floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the courtyard.
Dining room adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family gatherings and traditional Kerala meals.
Modern kitchen with traditional elements, equipped with modular storage and a small pantry.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom and dressing area, featuring a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows.
Second master bedroom with similar amenities, located on the opposite side of the house for privacy.
Guest room with attached bathroom, designed to accommodate visitors comfortably.
Servant quarters with basic amenities, located near the kitchen for convenience.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style wooden door as the main entrance to the house.
Access door to the central courtyard (Nalukettu style).
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room overlooking the courtyard.

other_features.description: Central courtyard (Nalukettu style) with traditional Kerala landscaping and a small water feature.

rooms.description: Third bedroom with attached bathroom and a private balcony.
Fourth bedroom with similar amenities, located adjacent to bedroom 3.
Study room or library with natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Access door to the balcony from bedroom 3.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the study room for ample natural light.

rooms.description: Open rooftop terrace with seating area and traditional Kerala-style gazebo.

openings.description: Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace from the first floor.

building_norm_compliance.local_building_norms: Complies with Kerala Municipal Corporation building regulations regarding FAR, setback, and open space requirements.
building_norm_compliance.vastu_principles: Designed adhering to Vastu Shastra principles: main entrance facing east, central courtyard for positive energy flow, and bedrooms aligned with cardinal directions.
